data.decision: Implement Orchestration Phase 1 as a thin workflow selector that routes intents through rules to skills with consistent run logging
data.rationale: Need a reusable "brain cell" pattern where: (1) rules gate what can happen, (2) skills do the work, (3) runs log everything. This makes compound workflows composable without adding complexity. Thin layer = easy to debug.
alternatives: No orchestrator - let Claude route manually each time
data.context: Duro already has rules, skills, and artifacts working. Missing piece is consistent execution logging and automatic rule-to-skill routing.
